Name: JellyMen
About the game: JellyMen is a chaotic split-screen party shooter where the goal is to be the last player standing to claim victory. Take advantage of a plethora of weapons to shoot, explode and pummel your enemies while avoiding the environmental hazards and destructible levels, win by knocking your opponents into the water below or by blowing the limbs from their jelly bodies. Take part in 4 different game modes such as: Jelly Fight, is a classic game mode of shooting your buddies to be the last one standing. Capture the flag, capture and return the flag to the finish line to win the game. Race Mode, race and beat your buddies to the finish line. and Hot Potato, pass the hot potato to others to not be blown up. Alternatively, play all of them at once! Customize your JellyMan in unique combinations! With a bunch of funky hats, outfits, and skins to create your own perfect Jelly being of destruction to your liking. Play with up to 4 players in multiplayer split-screen mode, or use Steam Remote to play online with your friends! Dive, flop and ragdoll around with unpredictable and hilarious physics with collapsable and breakable levels using explosive weaponry!
